thread.title: ‘Nashville’ sneak peek: Deacon visits Rayna at the hospital
thread.title_full: ‘Nashville’ sneak peek: Deacon visits Rayna at the hospital

author: Samantha Highfill
title: ‘Nashville’ sneak peek: Deacon visits Rayna at the hospital
text:
Email 
Last week’s Nashville left fans shocked when Rayna survived a near-death experience with her stalker only to get in a car accident on her way home. But there is at least some good news: EW has an exclusive sneak peek of this week’s episode, and in it, Rayna is awake and talking. 
In the clip, Deacon visits his wife at the hospital just as she’s starting to remember everything that happened, but more than that, she realizes that unlike so many times in her past, she can get through this because she has Deacon by her side. After all these years, it seems these two have finally figured things out. 
Nashville airs Thursdays at 9 p.m. ET on CMT. Show Full Article
